show_name: 12-Sai: Chiccha na Mune no Tokimeki Second Season (TV 2)
other_title: 12歳。～ちっちゃなムネのトキメキ～ セカンドシーズン (Japanese)
plot: Inama Mikami, a tall and handsome boy popular among girls, has shown his interest in Yui Aoi. He actively pursues Yui, troubling her and annoying her boyfriend Kazuma Hiyama.
opening_theme: "Ano ne Kimi Dake ni" by AŌP (eps 1-)
ending_theme: "Yūki no Tsubasa (Wings of Courage)" by Machico (eps 1-)
